column1: 1955: The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series):
:Because adaptor Terence Tiller thought the age difference between Bombadil and Goldberry was too big
column2: he made them father and daughter.
column4: pp. 8-23 J.R.R. Tolkien thought little of the change. No actress is credited specifically for the part
column5: though Nicolette Bernard is the only female in the episodes cast list
column6: making it likely she voiced Goldberry.Radio Times

column1: 1992: Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series):
:Sorcha Cusack played Goldberry in the episode "The Adventures of Tom Bombadil".Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)
2001-2007: The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game:
:Although Goldberry does not appear in The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column2: Decipher produced a card for the character. She was portrayed by Amanda Niel.

column1: 2002: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game):

:Goldberry appears at the house of Tom Bombadil. One of the tasks the player has to accomplish is bringing collecting water-lilies for Tom and Goldberry. She is voiced by Kath Soucie.The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)
2007-: The Lord of the Rings Online:
:Goldberry can be found at Goldberrys Spring in the Old Forest
column2: and is involved in a quest. She has a corrupt sister
